main event: An observation of a shiny disk-shaped object flying above Albuquerque, New Mexico, occurred on August 9, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed by multiple reliable witnesses including an airman and civilians., The disc-shaped object hovered before ascending rapidly., Witness descriptions noted the object was metallic and silvery in color., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes and the object disappeared at a high speed., The document associated with the report appears to be from Project Blue Book.
witness description: residents and an airman, familiar with aircraft
